# Welcome to SIWE-Verify-Service

The `cdk.json` file tells the CDK Toolkit how to execute your app.

## Test cases

```sh
curl -X POST \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -d '{"chainId": 84532, "address": "0x26692e752267b18e96f6386e4bE2ca58993148Fa", "nonce": "12345678", "issuedAt": "2024-10-26T23:33:04.275Z", "domain": "localhost:5173", "uri": "http://localhost:5173", "version": "1","statement": "Smart Wallet SIWE Example", "signature":""}' \
     https://3i1sngpoab.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/prod/verify

```

## Useful commands

- `sam local start-api -t cdk.out/SiweVerifyServiceStack.template.json`
- `npm run build` compile typescript to js
- `npm run watch` watch for changes and compile
- `npm run test` perform the jest unit tests
- `npx cdk deploy` deploy this stack to your default AWS account/region
- `npx cdk diff` compare deployed stack with current state
- `npx cdk synth` emits the synthesized CloudFormation template
